projects.name: Tellus
projects.tagline: A news aggregate site. World news: tailored to you
projects.info: A news aggregate site for users to view world news from any country and any organization. I pitched the original idea and oversaw the production as Project Manager. The app uses Ruby on Rails, Devise, Javascript, jQuery, Mapbox, APIs, and Chat-GPT.

projects.name: To Infinity and Beyond
projects.tagline: An Airbnb-style website linking jetpack owners to renters.
projects.info: An Airbnb-style website linking jetpack owners to renters, with the ability for users to leave reviews. As UX/UI Lead, I created the figma and oversaw the front-end production of the website. We used Ruby on Rails and Devise.
